Articles.Content: It'd be nice to be able to unlock a module that would do everything an add on like mechjeb or others do. This is something spacecraft can do so it's not unreasonable.

Then just install MechJeb.

P.S.

Autopilots are on the 'What not to suggest' list. You might want to read it.
